title: Setoff against refund
context: [ยง231-53] Setoff against refund. The State, through the department of accounting and general services, upon request of a claimant agency, shall set off any valid debt due and owing a claimant agency by the debtor against any debtor&rsquo;s refund. Any amount of the refund in excess of the amount retained to satisfy the debt shall be refunded to the debtor. [L 1982, c 199, pt of ยง1]
